historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2311 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-33, see notes following § 2-218.01.

DC CODE § 2-218.11

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Pursuant to § 1-204.04(b), there is established, as a subordinate agency, in the Executive Branch of the government of the District of Columbia, the Department of Small and Local Business Development.

subchapter.text: Small, Local, and Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Development and Assistance.

part.text: Department of Small and Local Business Development.

heading.catch_text: Establishment of the Department of Small and Local Business Development.
